history.content:
Hi all!

We’re a small group of students with a diverse set of backgrounds who love the tech community here on campus but are frustrated with many of the problems of the space. We’re hoping to invite students from *any* background who are involved (or want to be) in the tech space and are passionate about improving it

We’ve spent the past semester gathering resources, talking to faculty and club leaders about actionable ways to improve the tech space. We’re looking to bring together a community of students dedicated to working on results oriented projects. Check out some of our ideas (or suggest your own!): 

- Student Clubs/Organizations Demographics Survey
- Higher visibility to project/events in the Tech Space
- etc.
Some projects we have been involved with:
- Community Week - Course Planning
- Organization Faculty Meetings
- Tech Club Fair

If you are at all interested, fill out this interest form!

If you have any other questions or would like to know more about the other projects we are hoping to pursue, please email us at: tech-sc@berkeley.edu
# pin
history.subject: Helping out with the Tech Community
